title: Day in the Life of an IL Dairy Farmer #shorts

subtasks: Wake up early in the morning (around 4 a.m.)
Enjoy a glass of fresh milk upon waking
Attach milking machine to cows (place machine on teats)
Collect milk from whey jars into bulk tank
Perform feedlings for calves after milking
Tend to additional chores as needed
Spend extra time with a specific calf (Gloria's red baby calf)
Repeat milking process in the evening around 4 p.m.
